uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.http

Class HttpService

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.http.HttpService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppContextService<HttpService>, Contexed

    public class HttpService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Contexed, AppContextService<HttpService>
    A simple AppContextService to handle Http operations. These are implemented as a service to allow substitute code to be inserted for mock testing
    Author:
    spb

        public void cleanup()
        Description copied from interface: AppContextService
